name: Motivate Bicycle Share Developer Resources
tagline: This is a centralized place for all of our data feeds, trip histories, our Data Use Policy, and links to some useful third-party bike share related libraries and tools.
body:
# Motivate Bicycle Share Developer Resources

We here at [Motivate](http://www.motivateco.com/) love data, so we built this page for all the other transit and government data lovers out there that are interested in bike share system data. Its a centralized place for all of our data feeds, trip histories, our Data Use Policy, and links to some useful third-party bike share related libraries and tools.

### **Data Use Policy**

TBD

### **Technical Details**

*   Our feeds generally update once every minute. Please don't hit any one of them more often than that.
*   Older feeds are in [XML](http://www.w3.org/XML//) format, the newer ones are in [JSON](http://www.json.org/) format.
*   Each feed has an internal timestamp, use it to determine when the data was generated. The XML feeds use 13-digit unix timestamps including miliseconds.
*   Every public station is listed in the feed with its lat/lon values. Sometimes an address, landmark, or city is also included.
*   The feed includes how many bicycles and docks are available at each station.
*   Each station has an unique ID (id) that should never change.

### **Systems & Data Feeds**

*   [Melbourne Bikeshare](http://www.melbournebikeshare.com.au/ "http://www.melbournebikeshare.com.au/") - Melbourne, AU
    *   [XML Station Feed](http://www.melbournebikeshare.com.au/sites/default/files/XML/stations.xml "http://www.melbournebikeshare.com.au/sites/default/files/XML/stations.xml")
*   [Capital Bikeshare](http://capitalbikeshare.com/system-data "http://capitalbikeshare.com/system-data") - Washington, DC; Arlington and Alexandria, VA; Montgomery County, MD
    *   [XML Station Feed](http://www.capitalbikeshare.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml "http://www.capitalbikeshare.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml")
    *   [Trip History](http://capitalbikeshare.com/trip-history-data "http://capitalbikeshare.com/trip-history-data")
*   [Hubway](http://thehubway.com/ "http://thehubway.com/") - Boston-Metro, MA
    *   [XML Station Feed](http://www.thehubway.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml "http://www.thehubway.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml")
*   [Bike Chattanooga](http://www.bikechattanooga.com/ "http://www.bikechattanooga.com/") - Chattanooga, TN
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.bikechattanooga.com/stations/json "http://www.bikechattanooga.com/stations/json")
*   [Citi Bike](http://citibikenyc.com/ "http://citibikenyc.com/") - New York City, NY
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.citibikenyc.com/stations/json "http://www.citibikenyc.com/stations/json")
*   [Divvy Bikes](http://divvybikes.com/ "http://divvybikes.com/") - Chicago, IL
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.divvybikes.com/stations/json "http://www.divvybikes.com/stations/json")
*   [CoGo Bikeshare](http://cogobikeshare.com/ "http://cogobikeshare.com/") - Columbus, OH
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.cogobikeshare.com/stations/json "http://www.cogobikeshare.com/stations/json")
*   [Bay Area Bike Share](http://bayareabikeshare.com/ "http://bayareabikeshare.com/") - Bay Area, CA
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.bayareabikeshare.com/stations/json "http://www.bayareabikeshare.com/stations/json")
*   [Bike Share Toronto](http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/ "http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/") - Toronto, ON
    *   [XML Station Feed](http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml "http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/data/stations/bikeStations.xml")
    *   [JSON Station Feed](http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/stations/json "http://www.bikesharetoronto.com/stations/json")

### **Community Contributions**

Alta Bicycle Share, Inc. does not support any libraries, code, or data contained in any of the links in this section. That said, there is a thriving community of developers out there building tools to process our feeds, and we want to give them the attention they deserve.

##### **Libraries**

*   [Capital Bikeshare Personal Trip History Scrapper](https://github.com/harlanyu/Capital-Bikeshare-Scraper)

##### **Data Stores**

*   [Capital Bikeshare Dock History](http://opendatadc.org/dataset/capital-bikeshare-dock-history)

##### **Projects & Visualizations**

*   [Oliver O'Brien's Global Bike Share Map](http://bikes.oobrien.com/global.php)
*   [Hubway Data Challenge](http://hubwaydatachallenge.org/)
*   [Capital Bikeshare Tracker](http://cabitracker.com/)
*   [Bikeshare Odds](http://cmgiven.github.io/bikeshare-odds/)
*   [Various by Michael Schade](http://mvjantzen.com/cabi/tools/meetup.html)
*   [Data Science for Social Good's predictive models](https://github.com/dssg/bikeshare/wiki)
*   [Divvy Brags](http://divvybrags.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
